hero.main_title: We develop the future of your company
hero.main_subtitle: Specialists in modernizing critical processes using Artificial Intelligence, high-standard connectivity, and advanced telemetry solutions
hero.video_overlay_desc: Maintain full control of your fleet with our MoreGPS platform. Manage routes, receive alerts, and make real-time decisions from any device to transform vehicle data into profitability-boosting decisions.
hero.browser_support: Your browser does not support the video tag.

grid.whats_new: Take a look at what’s new.
grid.sentinel_subtitle: Increase your operation's safety with AI cameras that reduce accidents and associated costs by detecting driver fatigue and distractions on the road.
grid.tel_subtitle: Visualize alerts before failure or overspending; anticipate breakdowns, saving fuel and keeping your fleet always moving, optimizing every trip.

iot.title: IoT (Internet of Things)
iot.subtitle: Transform your assets into a smart network. Connect and automate control to optimize performance, anticipate parts wear, and reduce energy consumption, improving your bus efficiency and user experience.

totems.title: Interactive Totems
totems.subtitle: Decongest lines with self-service points, improve operational fluency within terminals. Passenger comfort and autonomy to print tickets, consult platforms, check schedules, or access services without unnecessary waits.

ecommerce.title: e-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.subtitle: Take your sales to the cloud with a 24/7 E-Commerce platform. Improve digital user experience and receive valuable data on their behavior to run personalized campaigns and measurably increase your commercial management.

wifi.title: Urban WiFi
wifi.subtitle: High-fidelity signal with industrial-grade hardware for strategic points. We transform connections into a competitive advantage, building customer loyalty.

showcase.camera_desc: Our platform learns from your users' behavior to adjust routes, anticipate peak seasons, and personalizing service, ensuring maximum bus occupancy and building customer loyalty.
showcase.battery_desc: We create a strategic alliance to modernize your processes, integrating our resources and specialized talent. We share challenges and opportunities, developing together innovative solutions that accelerate your growth.
showcase.chip_desc: We offer high-standard connectivity for key operations. With fast and stable fiber optic connection and 24/7 support, we guarantee maximum performance for your AI and telemetry processes.

ai.title: WIT Assistant
ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your WIT Assistant. How can I help you today?
ai.mock_response_price: Our products start from $999. Would you like to see the pricing for a specific model?
ai.mock_response_mac: The new MacBook lineup features the M3 chip, delivering incredible performance and battery life.
ai.mock_response_iphone: iPhone 15 Pro features a titanium design and the groundbreaking A17 Pro chip.
ai.mock_response_vision: Apple Vision Pro seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space.
ai.mock_response_default: I can help you explore our latest products, find a store, or answer support questions. What would you like to know?

timeline.title: Our Impact History
timeline.description: Discover how we have transformed key industries in Chile through technological innovation and strategic alliances.

items.metro: Implementation of real-time monitoring systems to optimize passenger flow and reduce wait times during peak hours.
items.pullman: Fleet modernization with IoT sensors for predictive maintenance and improved road safety.
items.parque_arauco: Development of a data analysis platform to understand visitor behavior and personalize the shopping experience.
items.transantiago: Integration of advanced GPS for fleet tracking and route optimization in the public transport system.
items.claro: Strengthening 5G network infrastructure and deploying high-speed enterprise connectivity solutions.
